pages.text: Those who humble themselves in their prayers
Who are active in deeds of charity
Except with their mates, or those whom their right hands possess, for in their case they are free from blame
But those whose desires exceed these limits are transgressors
But those who faithfully observe their trusts and their promises
And who strictly remember their prayers
Who will inherit paradise. They will dwell therein forever
And indeed We created humanity from a quintessence of clay
Then We placed them as a zygote in a place of rest, firmly fixed

Then We made the zygote into an embryo, then of that embryo We made a fetus, then we made the fetus into bones and clothed the bones with flesh, then we developed out of it another creature. So blessed is God, the best of creators
After that, you will eventually die
Then on the Day of Accountability, you will be raised up
And We have made above you seven paths, and We are never unmindful of Our creation
